The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
Please be reminded that the photography competition started yesterday and the final entries must be received by the 4th November. The theme for submission is 'Natural' and photos need to be submitted as an A4 print to Mrs. Thompson (Upper Campus) and also emailed to lauren.thompson@internationalschool.ru.
Entries will be judged in four categories:
- Lower Primary - Upper Primary - Secondary - Teachers and Parents
Please click here to download the poster.
Workshops for Parents
Claire Geddes, Coach and Trainer and ISM mother will be presenting a series of 4 workshops for parents. The first session, Bringing Up Children Abroad, will take place this Thursday 10th October.
The different sessions are as follows:
- Bringing Up Children Abroad - 10th October
- Survival as a Trailing Spouse - 17th October
- Life with Teenagers Abroad - 7th November
- Preparing for a Move and Early Days - 14th November
Each session will start at 14:00 until 15:30.
For more information and to register, please contact Claire Geddes at familygeddes@hotmail.com.
(Please click here to download the flyer).
Best regards,
Admissions Department The International School of Moscow World Class Education
